name: Genio - Playing the Renaissance
blurb: Genio is a fun approach to history, science and ideas. A videogame, 3D models and toys about Renaissance engineering, art and power.

rewards.reward: DA VINCI SKETCHES & CARDS DOWNLOAD. Download of Genio folio sketches from the Book of Ideas and the character and builder cards, all in HD. You get inventions & idea sketches inspired by Da Vinci, Brunelleschi, Machiavelli. You also get reserved development updates.
A FULL COPY OF GENIO GAME. A full digital copy of Genio the moment it is released. DRM-free, for Win Mac Linux. All previous rewards included.

ORIGINAL GAME SOUNDTRACK + PDF CONCEPT BOOK. A download featuring Genio's original soundtrack + a booklet PDF of concept art and 3D models of inventions - cool stuff from Alex! All previous rewards included.

EARLY BIRD: FULL COPY+SOUNDTRACK+CONCEPT+1 3D PRINTER BLUEPRINT. A full digital copy of Genio DRM-free, for Win Mac Linux + Android tablets + soundtrack + booklet PDF of concept art and 3D models of inventions  + one 3D printer file so you can print a blueprint of a Leonardo da Vinci machine sculpture.
IPAD TABLET GAME LICENSE. You get a digital Genio app for iPad. All previous unlimited rewards included.
ANDROID TABLET GAME LICENSE. You get a digital Genio app for Android tablets. All previous unlimited rewards included.
DA VINCI MACHINE SCULPTURE BLUEPRINTS.\r\nYou get two original 3D printer files so you can print two blueprints of a Leonardo da Vinci machine sculpture.  All previous unlimited rewards included.

ART LOVER: CHARACTER CANVAS PRINT. You get a high quality print on 100% natural cotton canvas of one of Genio\u2019s main characters. It is always a reinterpretation of a Renaissance portrait. You will pick which character you want from our offer. Size 30x40 cm, 12x16 inches. Frame not included.

SPONSOR REWARD: BETA AND SOURCES. \r\nYou get access to Genio's beta and full Unity project source code. Also get a reserved video explanation of the code, and a special mention in the game.  All previous unlimited rewards included (delivery time may be different).

ONE LEONARDO DA VINCI TOY SET. You get a toy (made of anticated brass and wood) designed by da Vinci in his sketches. You can pick between a spinning top and a yo-yo. In the beautiful box you get also: (i) a booklet with the history of the toy (ii) an accurate reproduction of Leonardo's folio. All previous unlimited rewards included (delivery times may be different), shipping in the UK included.

TWO LEONARDO DA VINCI TOY SETS. You get two toys (made of anticated brass and wood) designed by da Vinci in his sketches. You get both a spinning top and a yo-yo. In the beautiful boxes you get also: (i) a booklet with the history of the toy (ii) an accurate reproduction of Leonardo's folio. All previous digital unlimited rewards included (delivery may be different), shipping in the UK included.

ART MAECENAS: TWO TOYS AND TWO CANVAS PRINTS. You get both two toy sets and two canvas prints. All previous digital unlimited rewards included (delivery may be different), shipping in the UK included.

HAND MADE LEATHER BOOK OF IDEAS.\r\nLimited edition handcrafted, leather-bound printed version of the Book of Ideas, with around 50 folios in high quality paper. All previous digital unlimited rewards included (delivery may be different), shipping in the UK included.

ART COLLECTOR: TWO TOYS, TWO CANVAS PRINTS AND HAND MADE BOOK OF IDEAS. You get two toy sets, two canvas prints and the printed Book of Ideas. All previous digital unlimited rewards included (delivery may be different), shipping in the UK included.

TOUR TUSCANY WITH US. A Leonardo da Vinci guided tour in Tuscany, for 2 people. We will take you to da Vinci's places and to our labs. Includes two days stay for two people - you'll stay in a beautiful hotel. Travel expenses not included. Includes all previous digital rewards and the toys (delivery times may be different).

MUSEUM QUALITY DA VINCI MACHINE. Real wooden handmade Leonardo da Vinci machine: a working model, philologically accurate in materials and design, uniquely built for the pledger. Pledger can pick among several machine types. All previous digital rewards included, shipping included - also toys inside :-)
